## Kalman process chart

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library('DiagrammeR')

grViz("
digraph Kalman {

  # a 'graph' statement
  graph [overlap = true, fontsize = 10]

  # several 'node' statements
  node [shape     = box,
        fontname  = Helvetica,
        fillcolor = green]
OEE [label = 'Original error estimate']
EE  [label = 'Error in estimate']
KG  [label = 'Calculate Kalman gain']
ED  [label = 'Error in data (measurement)']
CCE [label = 'Calculate current estimate']
CNE [label = 'Calculate new error in estimate']
UE  [label = 'Updates estimate']
PE  [label = 'Previous estimate']
MV  [label = 'Measured values']
OE  [label = 'Original estimate']
DI  [label = 'Data input']

subgraph {
rank = same; OEE; OE; DI;
}

subgraph {
rank = same; EE; ED; PE; MV;
}

subgraph {
rank = same; KG: CCE; CNE;
}

  # several 'edge' statements
    OEE->EE   
    OE->PE
    DI->MV
    
    EE->KG
    ED->KG
    PE->KG
    MV->KG

    KG->CCE
    KG->PE
    CCE->CNE
    CNE->EE
    CCE->UE
}

")
```
